title: FORTNITE SURPASSED LOL IN POPULARITY. OH, POOR, POOR RIOT :)
body: I just thought it was funny! Fortnite is officially banking in more than LOL. I give LOL two years before they START to actually sink below the sea.

replies.body: Seems like everyone saying "LoL is Doomed" have only been playing for like 2-3 years... this game is over 8 years old people, it is the WoW of the MOBA world. It will never die. It may become less popular, but it will never disappear.
I remember people saying this about Overwatch a while back. Didn't last long.
When they realise that changing the game for the sake of it, or to attract casuals is not gonna work, it will be too late. Kinda like runescape.
